017package de.learnlib.cache;
018
019import net.automatalib.automata.fsa.DFA;
020import net.automatalib.automata.transout.MealyMachine;
021import net.automatalib.words.Word;
022import de.learnlib.api.MembershipOracle;
023
024/**
025 * A {@link LearningCache learning cache} that also serves as a {@link MembershipOracle membership oracle}.
026 * 
027 * @author Malte Isberner
028 *
029 * @param <A>
030 *              the (maximally generic) automaton model for which the cache stores information. See {@link LearningCache}
031 * @param <I>
032 *              input symbol type
033 * @param <O>
034 *              output type
035 */
036public interface LearningCacheOracle<A, I, O> extends LearningCache<A,I,O>, MembershipOracle<I, O> {
037        
038        /**
039         * Specialization of the {@link LearningCacheOracle} interface for DFA learning.
040         *  
041         * @author Malte Isberner
042         *
043         * @param <I> input symbol type
044         */
045        public static interface DFALearningCacheOracle<I>
046                extends LearningCacheOracle<DFA<?,I>,I,Boolean>, DFALearningCache<I>, DFAMembershipOracle<I> {}
047        
048        /**
049         * Specialization of the {@link LearningCacheOracle} interface for Mealy machine learning.
050         * 
051         * @author Malte Isberner
052         *
053         * @param <I> input symbol type
054         * @param <O> output symbol type
055         */
056        public static interface MealyLearningCacheOracle<I,O>
057                extends LearningCacheOracle<MealyMachine<?,I,?,O>,I,Word<O>>, MealyLearningCache<I,O>, MealyMembershipOracle<I,O> {}
058}
